title: The Dilemma: a child sexual abuse training package for doctors
creator_credit: Fiona Cochrane, John Hipwell, Film Victoria, Community Services Victoria and HIPS Film and Video Productions
brief_description: Designed to assist general practitioners to appropriately identify and manage their response to child abuse and neglect focussing on one general practitioners response to a case of child sexual abuse. Accompanied by a 27p. User’s Guide.
